1.verse: [B] Pawlus, apau(s)taulus Xristaus Iesuis þairh wiljan gudis, þaim weiham þaim wisandam in Aifaison jah triggwaim in Xristau Iesu.

2.verse: [B] ansts izwis jah gawairþi fram guda attin unsaramma jah fraujin Iesu Xristau.

3.verse: [B] þiuþiþs guþ jah atta fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus, izei gaþiuþida uns in allai þiuþeinai ahmeinai in himinakundaim in Xristau.

4.verse: [B] swaswe gawalida unsis in imma faur gasatein fairhvaus, ei sijaima weis weihai jah unwammai in andwairþja is in friaþwai.

5.verse: [B] fauragarairoþ uns du suniwe gadedai þairh Iesu Xristu in imma bi leikainai wiljins seinis,

6.verse: [B] du hazeinai wulþaus anstais seinaizos, in þizaiei ansteigs was uns in þamma liubin sunau seinamma,

7.verse: [B] in þammei habam faurbauht, f(r)a(le)t frawaurhte þairh bl(oþ) is, bi gabein wu(l)þaus a(ns)tais is,

8.verse: [B] þoei ufarassau ganohida in uns in allai handugein jah frodein,

9.verse: [B] kannjan unsis runa wiljins seinis b(i) (w)iljin, saei fauragaleikaida imma

10.verse: [B] du fauragaggja (u)sfulleinais mele, aftra (usfu)lljan alla in Xristau, þo (ana) himinam jah ana airþai in imma,

11.verse: [B] in þammei hlauts gasatidai wesum, faur(a)garedanai (b)i w(i)ljin gudis þ(is) alla in al(l)aim waurkjandins bi muna (wi)ljins seinis,

12.verse: [B] ei sijaima weis du hazeinai wulþaus is þai faur(a)wenjandans in Xristau,

13.verse: [B] in þammei jah jus gahausjandans waurd sunjos, aiwaggeli ganis(t)ais izwaraizos, þammei (ga)laubjandan(s) ga(si)glidai (w)aurþuþ ahmin ga(ha)itis þamma weihin,

14.verse: [B] izei ist (wa)di arbjis unsaris du faur(b)auhtai (ga)freideinais, du hazeinai wulþaus is.

15.verse: [B] duþþe jah ik, gahausjan(ds) izwara galaubein in fraujin Iesu Xristau jah friaþwa in allans þ(a)ns weihans,

16.verse: [B] unsweibands awiliudo in izwara, gamund (waurk)jands in bidom meinaim,

17.verse: [B] ei guþ fraujins u(n)saris Iesuis Xristaus, atta wulþ(a)us, gibai izwis ahman handugeins jah andhuleinais in ufkunþja seinamma,

18.verse: [B] inliuh[i]tida augona hairtins izwaris, ei witeiþ jus hva ist wens laþonais is, hvileiku<h> gabei wulþaus arbjis is in weihaim,

19.verse: [B] jah hva ufarass(u)s mikileins mahtais is in uns þaim galaubjandam bi waur(s)twa mahtais swinþeins is,

20.verse: [B] þatei gawaurhta in Xristau, urraisjands ina us dauþaim jah gasatida in taihswon seinai in himinam

21.verse: [B] ufaro allaize reikje jah waldufnje jah mahte jah fraujinassiwe jah allaize namne namnidaize ni þatainei in þamma aiwa, ak jah in þamma anawairþin.

22.verse: [B] jah all ufhnaiwida uf fotuns imma jah ina atgaf haubiþ ufar alla aikklesjon,

23.verse: [B] sei ist leik is, fullo þis alla in allaim usfulljandins.

1.verse: [B] Jah izwis wisandans dauþans missadedim jah frawaurhtim izwaraim,

2.verse: [B] in þaimei simle iddjeduþ bi þizai aldai þis aiwis, bi reik waldufnjis luftaus, ahmins þis (n)u waurkjandins in sunum ungalaubeinais,

3.verse: [B] in þaimei jah weis allai usmetum suman in lustum leikis unsaris, taujandans wiljans leikis jah gamitone, jah wisum wistai barna hatis, swaswe jah þai anþarai.

4.verse: [B] iþ guþ, gabeigs wisands in armahairtein, in þizos managons frijaþwos in þizaiei frijoda uns,

5.verse: [B] jah wisandans uns dauþans frawaurhtim , miþgaqiwida uns Xristau - anstai sijum ganasidai -

6.verse: [B] jah miþurraisidai jah miþga(s)atidai in himinakundaim in Xristau Iesu,

7.verse: [B] ei ataugjai in aldim þaim anagaggandeim ufarassu gabeins anstais seinaizos in selein bi uns in Xristau Iesu.

8.verse: [B] unte anstai sijuþ ganasidai þairh galaubein, jah þata ni us izwis, ak gudis giba ist;

9.verse: [B] ni us waurstwam, ei hvas ni hvopai,

10.verse: [B] ak is sijum taui, gaskapanai in Xristau Iesu du waurstwam godaim, þoei fauragamanwida guþ, ei in þaim (ga)ggaima.

11.verse: [B] duþþe gamuneiþ þatei jus þiudos simle wesuþ in leika, þai namnidans unbimaitanai fram þizai namnidon bimait in leika handuwaurht.

12.verse: [B] unte wesuþ þan in jainamma mela inuh Xristu, framaþjai usmetis Israelis jah gasteis gahaite trausteis, wen ni habandans jah g(uda)lausai in manasedai.

13.verse: [B] iþ (nu) sai, in Xristau Iesu jus juzei sim(le) (w)esuþ fairra, waurþuþ nehva in bloþa Xristaus.

14.verse: [B] sa auk ist gawairþi unsar, saei gatawida þo ba du samin jah miþgardawaddju faþos gatairands,

15.verse: [B] fijaþwa, ana leika seinamma witoþ anabusne garaideinim gatairands, ei þans twans gaskopi in sis silbin du ainamma niujamma mann, waurkjan(ds) gawairþi,

16.verse: [B] jah gafriþodedi þans bans in ainamma leika guda þairh galgan, afslahan<d>s fijaþwa in sis silbin.

17.verse: [B] jah qimands wailamerida gawairþi izwis juzei fairra jah gawairþi þaim izei nehva;

18.verse: [B] unte þ(a)irh ina habam atgagg bajoþs in ainamma ahmin du att(in).

19.verse: [B] sai nu ju ni sijuþ gasteis (jah) aljakonjai, ak sijuþ gaba(urg)jans þaim weiham jah ing(ar)djans gudis,

20.verse: [B] anatimridai ana grunduwaddjau apaustaule jah praufete, at wisandin auhumistin waihstastaina silbin Xristau Iesu,

21.verse: [B] in þammei alla gatimrjo gagatiloda wahseiþ du alh weihai in fraujin,

22.verse: [B] in þammei jah jus miþgatimridai sijuþ du bauainai gudis in ahmin.

1.verse: [B] In þizozei waihtais ik Pawlus bandja Xristaus Iesuis in izwara þiudo,

2.verse: [B] jabai sweþauh hausideduþ fauragaggi gudis anstais, sei gibana ist mis in izwis;

3.verse: [B] unte bi andhuleinai gakannida was mis so runa, swe fauragamelida in leitilamma,

4.verse: [B] duþþe ei siggwandans mageiþ fraþjan frodein meinai in runai Xristaus,

5.verse: [B] þatei anþaraim aldim ni kunþ was sunum manne, swaswe nu andhuliþ ist þaim weiham is apaustaulum jah praufetum in ahmin,

6.verse: [B] wisan þiudos gaarbjans jah galeikans jah gadailans gahaitis is in Xr(is)tau Iesu þairh aiwaggeljon,

7.verse: [B] þizozei warþ andbahts ik bi gibai anstais gudis þizai gibanon mis bi toja mahtais is.

8.verse: [B] mis, þamma undarleijin allaize þize weihane, atgibana warþ ansts so, in þiudom wailamerjan þo unfairlaistidon gabein Xristaus,

9.verse: [B] jah inliuhtjan allans, hvileik þata fauragaggi runos þizos gafulginons fram aiwam in guda þamma alla gaskapjandin,

10.verse: [B] ei kanniþ wesi nu reikjam jah waldufnjam in þaim himinakundam þairh aikklesjon so managfalþo handugei gudis,

11.verse: [B] bi muna aiwe þanei gatawida in Xristau Iesu fraujin unsaramma,

12.verse: [B] in þammei habam balþein jah atgagg in trauainai þairh galaubein is.

13.verse: [B] in þize bidja, ni wairþaiþ usgrudjans in aglom meinaim faur izwis, þatei ist wulþus izwar.

14.verse: [B] in þis biuga kniwa meina du attin fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus,

15.verse: [B] us þammei all fadreinis in himina jah ana airþai namnjada,

16.verse: [B] ei gibai izwis bi gabein wulþaus seinis mahtai gaswinþnan þairh ahman seinana in innuman mannan,

17.verse: [B] bauan Xristu þairh galaubein in hairtam izwaraim,

18.verse: [B] ei in friaþwai gawaurhtai jah gasulidai mageiþ gafahan miþ allaim þaim weiham hva sijai braidei jah laggei jah hauhei jah diupei;

19.verse: [B] kunnan þo ufarassau mikilon þis kunþjis friaþwa Xristaus, ei fullnaiþ du allai fullon gudis.

20.verse: [B] aþþan þamma mahteigin ufar all taujan maizo þau bidjam aiþþau fraþjam bi mahtai þizai waurkjandein in uns,

21.verse: [B] imma wulþus in aikklesjon in Xristau Iesu in allos aldins aiwe, amen.

1.verse: [B] Bidja nu izwis ik bandja in fraujin, wairþaba gaggan þizos laþonais þizaiei laþodai sijuþ,

2.verse: [B] miþ allai hauneinai jah qairrein, miþ usbeisnai usþulandans izwis misso in friaþwai,

3.verse: [B] usdaudjandans fastan ainamundiþa ahmins in gabundjai gawairþeis.

4.verse: [B] ain leik jah ains ahma, swaswe atlaþodai sijuþ in aina wen laþonais izwaraizos.

5.verse: [B] ains frauja, aina galaubeins, aina daupeins,

7.verse: [A] iþ ainhvarjammeh unsara atgibana ist ansts bi mitaþ gibos Xristaus;

8.verse: [A] in þizei qiþiþ: ussteigands in hauhiþa ushanþ hunþ jah atuhgaf gibos mannam.

9.verse: [A] þatuþ~þan usstaig, hva ist, niba þatei jah atstaig faurþis in undar[a]isto airþos?

10.verse: [A] saei atstaig, sa ist jah saei usstaig ufar allans himinans, ei usfullidedi allata.

11.verse: [A] jah silba gaf sumans apaustaul(u)ns, sumanzuþ~þan praufetuns, sumansuþ~þan aiwaggelistans, sumansuþ~þan hairdjans jah laisarjans,

12.verse: [A] du ustauhtai weihaize du waurstwa andbahtjis, du timreinai leikis Xristaus,

13.verse: [A] unte garinnaima allai in ainamundiþa galaubeinais jah ufkunþjis sunus gudis, du waira fullamma, in mitaþ wahstaus fullons Xristaus,

14.verse: [A] ei þanaseiþs ni sijaima niuklahai uswagidai jah uswalugidai winda hvammeh laiseinais, liutein manne, in filudeisein du listeigon uswandjai airzeins,

15.verse: [A] iþ sunja taujandans in frijaþwai wahsjaima in ina þo alla, ize ist haubiþ, Xristus,

16.verse: [A] us þammei all leik gagatiloþ <jah> gagahaftiþ þairh allos gawissins andstaldis, bi waurstwa in mitaþ ana ainhvarjoh fero, uswahst leikis taujiþ du timreinai seinai in frijaþwai.

17.verse: [B] þata nu qiþa jah weitwo(d)ja in fraujin, ei þanaseiþs ni gaggaiþ, swaswe jah anþaros þiudos gaggand in uswissja hugis seinis,

18.verse: [B] riqizeinai gahugdai wisandans, framaþjai libainais gudis in unwitjis þis wisandins in im, in daubiþos hairtane seinaize,

19.verse: [B] þaiei uswenans waurþanai sik silbans atgebun aglaitein in waurstwein unhrainiþos allaizos, in faihufrikein.

20.verse: [B] iþ jus ni swa ganemuþ Xristu,

21.verse: [B] jabai sweþauh ina hausideduþ jah in imma uslaisidai sijuþ, swaswe ist sunja in Iesu,

22.verse: [B] ei aflagjaiþ jus bi frumin usmeta þana fairnjan mannan þana riurjan bi lustum afmarzeinais.

24.verse: [B] jah gahamoþ þamma niujin mann þamma bi guda gaskapanin in garaihtein jah weihiþai sunjos.

25.verse: [B] in þizei aflagjandans liugn rodjaiþ sunja hvarjizuh miþ nehvundjin seinamma, unte sijuþ anþar anþaris liþus.

26.verse: [B] þwairhaiþ~þan sijaiþ jah ni frawaurkjaiþ, sunno ni disiggqai ana þwairhein izwara.

28.verse: [B] saei hlefi, þanaseiþs ni hlifai, ak mais arbaidjai, waurkjands swesaim handum þiuþ, ei habai dailjan þaurbandin.

29.verse: [B] ainhun waurde ubilaize us munþa izwaramma ni usgaggai, ak þatei goþ sijai du timreinai galaubeinais, ei gibai anst hausjandam.

30.verse: [B] jah ni gaurjaiþ þana weihan ahman gudis, þammei gasiglidai sijuþ in daga uslauseinais.

31.verse: [B] alla baitrei jah hatis jah þwairhei jah hrops jah wajamereins afwairpaidau af izwis miþ allai unselein.

32.verse: [B] wairþaiduh miþ izwis misso seljai, armahairtai, fragibandans izwis misso, swaswe guþ in Xristau fragaf izwis.

1.verse: [B] Wairþaiþ nu galeikondans gud(a) swe barna liuba

2.verse: [B] jah gagga(iþ) in friaþwai, swaswe jah Xristu(s) frijoda uns jah atgaf si(k) si(l)ban faur uns hunsl jah sauþ guda du daunai woþjai.

3.verse: [B] aþþan horinassus jah allos unhrainiþos aiþþau faihufrikei nih namnjaidau in izwis, swaswe gadob ist weihaim,

4.verse: [B] aiþþau <aglaitiwaurdei aiþþau> dwala(wa)urdei aiþþau saldra, þoei d(u) þaurftai ni fairrinnand, ak mais awiliuda.

5.verse: [B] þata auk witeiþ, kunnandans þatei hvazu<h> hors aiþþau unhrains aiþþau faihufriks, þatei ist galiugag(u)de skalkinassaus, ni habaiþ a(r)bi in þiudangardjai Xristaus jah gudis.

6.verse: [B] ni manna izwis uslu[s]to lausaim waurdam, þairh þoei (q)imiþ hatis gudis ana sunum un(ga)laubeinais.

8.verse: [B] wesuþ auk suman (r)i(q)iz, iþ nu liuhaþ in fraujin; swe barna liuhadis gaggaiþ. -

9.verse: [B] aþþan akran liuhadis ist in allai selein jah garaihtein jah sunjai. -

10.verse: [B] gakiusandans þatei sijai waila galeikaiþ fraujin,

17.verse: [A] duþþe ni wairþaiþ unfrodai, ak fraþjandans hva sijai wilja fraujins.

18.verse: [A] jah ni anadrigkaiþ izwis weina, in þammei ist usstiurei, ak fullnaiþ in ahmin,

19.verse: [A] rodjandans izwis in psalmom jah hazeinim jah saggwim ahmeinaim, siggwandans in hairtam izwaraim fraujin,

20.verse: [A] awiliudondans sinteino fram allaim in namin fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus attin jah guda,

21.verse: [A] ufhausjandans izwis misso in agisa Xristaus.

22.verse: [A] qenes seinaim abnam ufhausjaina swaswe fraujin;

23.verse: [A] unte wair ist haubiþ qenais swaswe jah Xristus haubiþ aikklesjons, jah is ist nasjands leikis.

24.verse: [A] akei swaswe aikklesjo ufhauseiþ Xristu, swah qenes abnam seinaim in allamma.

25.verse: [A] jus wairos frijoþ qenins izwaros, swaswe jah Xristus frijoda aikklesjon jah sik silban atgaf faur þo,

26.verse: [A] ei þo gaweihaidedi gahrainjands þwahla watins in waurda,

27.verse: [A] ei ustauhi silba sis wulþaga aikklesjon, ni habandein wamme aiþþau maile aiþþau hva swaleikaize, ak ei sijai weiha jah unwamma.

28.verse: [A] swa jah wairos skulun frijon seinos qenins swe leika seina. [sein silbins leik frijoþ,] saei seina qen frijoþ, [jah] sik silban frijoþ.

29.verse: [A] ni auk manna hvanhun sein leik fijaida, ak fodeiþ ita jah warmeiþ swaswe jah Xristus aikklesjon . . . .

8.verse: [B] . . . . taujiþ þiuþis, þata ganimiþ at fraujin, jaþþe skalks jaþþe freis.

9.verse: [B] jah jus fraujans [jah jus fraujans] þata samo taujaiþ wiþra ins, fraletandans im hvotos, witandans þatei im jah izwis sama frauja ist in himinam, jah wiljahalþei nist at imma.

10.verse: [B] þata nu anþar, broþrjus meinai, inswin(þ)jaiþ izwis in fraujin jah in mahtai swinþeins is.

11.verse: [B] gahamoþ izwis sarwam gudis, ei mageiþ standan wiþra listins diabulaus;

12.verse: [B] unte nist izwis brakja wiþra leik jah bloþ, ak wiþra reikja jah waldufnja, wiþra þans fairhvu habandans riqizis þis, wiþra þo ahmeinona unseleins in þaim himinakundam.

13.verse: [B] duþþe nimiþ sarwa gudis, ei mageiþ andstandan in þamma daga ubilin jah in allamma uswaurkjandans standan.

14.verse: [B] standaiþ nu, ufgaurdanai hupins izwarans sunjai jah gapaidodai brunjon garaihteins,

15.verse: [B] jah gaskohai fotum in manwiþai aiwaggeljons gawairþjis

16.verse: [B] ufar all andnimandans skildu galaubeinais, þammei maguþ allos arhvaznos þis unseleins funiskos afhvapjan;

17.verse: [B] jah hilm naseinais nimaiþ jah meki ahmins, þatei ist waurd gudis;

18.verse: [B] þairh allos aihtronins jah bidos aihtrondans in alla mela in ahmin jah du þamma wakandans sinteino in allai usdaudein jah bidom fram allaim þaim weiham,

19.verse: [B] jah fram mis, ei mis gibaidau waurd in usluka munþis mein[a]is in balþein kannjan runa aiwaggeljons,

20.verse: [B] faur þoei airino in kunawidom, ei in izai gadaursjau, swe skuljau rodjan.

21.verse: [B] (aþþa)n ei <jah> jus witeiþ hva bi mik ist, hva ik tauja, kanneiþ izwis allata Twkeikus sa liuba broþar jah triggwa andbahts in fraujin,

22.verse: [B] þanei insandida du izwis, duþþe ei kunneiþ (hva) b(i) mik ist, jah gaþrafstjai hairtona izwara.

23.verse: [B] gawairþi broþrum jah friaþwa miþ galaubeinai fram guda attin jah fraujin Iesu Xristau.
